title: BT Group : Adjusted revenues 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Revenue in million GBP has rose over the Year.

Revenue in million GBP is roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2015, rapidly increasing from 2015 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Revenue in million GBP, of value 24082.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Revenue in million GBP about 17840.0 was reached at Year 2015
